title: Vindici√¶ veritatis: truth vindicated against calumny. In a briefe answer to Dr. Bastwicks two late books, entituled, Independency not Gods ordinance, with the second part, styled the postscript, &c. / By Henry Burton, one of his quondam-fellow-sufferers.
author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
publisher: Printed by M.S. for Gyles Calvert, and are to be sold at his shop at the west end of Pauls.,
notes: A reply to "Independency not Gods ordinance" by John Bastwick, published in two parts.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
